Class Scorecard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Scorecard

  • public class Scorecard
extends java.lang.Object
    Erik Fox Homework 3 Last Modified:2/24/2017 Description: This class creates a scorecard out of scorecard lines and outputs it in the console

      creates a new blank scorecard
      void displayFinalScorecard()
      displays the final scorecard with all of the values
      void displayScorecard(Hand hand)
      displays the scorecard between hands and saves the score of each line to a respective potential score in the ScoreCard class
      int lowerScore()
      calculates the total of the lower scorecard
      void scoreValue()
      send the score being chosen to the respective ScorecardLine
      int totalScore()
      calculates the overall total
      int upperScore()
      calculates the total of the upper scorecard
